channel.title: Other players cant get on my 508 server
channel.description: my friend said he cant get on my 508 it gets stuck at the client even when i have my server on im the only one who can play it how do i make it public?

item.title: Other players cant get on my 508 server
item.dc:creator: @zerokainin zerokainin
item.description:
@zerokainin wrote:

i have a router for my laptop but im using my main comp. and how do i put that port open and how do u make windows firewall port open and how do i change that ip adress like i cant even post it on runelocus it says its offlline

Read full topic
item.source: Other players cant get on my 508 server

item.title: Other players cant get on my 508 server
item.dc:creator: @games4pros games4pros
item.description:
@games4pros wrote:

first of all, are you using a router, if so then make sure your port 43594 is open.
if thats is done the make sure your windows firewall’s port is open
if thats open, make sure that the other guy is using the correct client and that the client isnt connecting to 127.0.0.1 but rather to your ip address (ipchicken.com)

thats all i can help you with atm. im out of reasons

Read full topic
